fw.name: CATxPDMInterfaces
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

class.name: CATxPDMFileServices
class.abstract: Class for PDM services working directly on files not necessary loaded in session.

method.name: CheckItemCompatibility
method.abstract: Checks that two items are compatible.

method.name: CreateSendToService
method.abstract: Creates a Send To service pointer.

method.name: GetConsistentSetOfItems
method.abstract: Searches list of pointed items.

method.name: GetConsistentSetOfItemsFromDirectory
method.abstract: Searches list of pointed items in a specific list of directories.

method.name: GetImpactedDrawingsFromDirectory
method.abstract: Searches list of impacted Drawings.

method.name: GetItemFromFile
method.abstract: Retrieves an item from a file path.

method.name: SearchRootItems
method.abstract: Searches root items in a list of directories.

class.name: CATxPDMProductServices
class.abstract: Class for PDM services working on Part and Product items loaded in session.

method.name: ChangeContext
method.abstract: Changes Product context of a CATPart item.

method.name: SetProductInstanceActivation
method.abstract: Activate or Deactivate a product instance with session impacts.

class.name: CATxPDMSessionServices
class.abstract: Class for PDM services working on items loaded in session.

method.name: BreakAllExternalLinks
method.abstract: Breaks external links of an item.

method.name: CheckDesignRules
method.abstract: Check rules necessary for PDM before Save.

method.name: CheckFeatureCompatibility
method.abstract: Checks that two features are compatible.

method.name: FindNonImportedPublications
method.abstract: Retrieves publications from an instance not imported in a specific item.

method.name: GetItemFromDocument
method.abstract: Retrieves an item from a document loaded in session.

method.name: GetItemFromFeature
method.abstract: Retrieves an item from a feature loaded in session.

method.name: GetxPDMItemsInSession
method.abstract: Retrieves all items loaded in session.

method.name: IsImported
method.abstract: Retrieves if an object from an instance is imported in a specific item.

method.name: LoadItemInSession
method.abstract: Loads an item in session.

method.name: NeedToLaunchCATDUAForLinksAnalysis
method.abstract: Check contents of item to verify if CATDUA will improve link status.

method.name: RefreshItemInformation
method.abstract: Refreshes some session information on a loaded item.

method.name: SaveSessionToDirectory
method.abstract: Saves a session to a specific directory.

method.name: SetExternalLinksStatus
method.abstract: Manages links activity of an item.

method.name: SetInitialDocFileName
method.abstract: Sets an initial file name on an item.

method.name: SynchronizeAllExternalLinks
method.abstract: Synchronizes external links of an item.

method.name: UnLoadItemFromSession
method.abstract: Unloads an item from session.

enum.name: ItemRefresh
enum.abstract: Item information to refresh in session.

class.name: CATxPDMSessionUIServices
class.abstract: Class for PDM to manage interactive feedbacks of PDM in CATIA Session.

method.name: ConnectToPX1
method.abstract: Activate all PX1 interactive feedbacks.

method.name: ConnectToPX1
method.abstract: Activate all PX1 interactive feedbacks.

method.name: DisconnectFromPX1
method.abstract: Disconnect from PX1.

method.name: DisconnectFromPX1
method.abstract: Disconnect from PX1.

method.name: GetCurrentDirectory
method.abstract: Retrieve current directory.

class.name: CATIxPDMItem
class.abstract: Interface to access any V5 item that can be stored in an external File PDM system.

method.name: CanBeLoaded
method.abstract: Checks if the item can be loaded in session.

method.name: Compare
method.abstract: Checks if two items are describing the same file.

method.name: GeneratePreview
method.abstract: Generates a preview file according to the given format.

method.name: GetChildrenItems
method.abstract: Returns all children of the item.

method.name: GetDocFileName
method.abstract: Retrieves the full path of the item.

method.name: GetDocId
method.abstract: Retrieves the identifier of the item.

method.name: GetItemType
method.abstract: Retrieves the real type of the item.

method.name: GetLastSavePath
method.abstract: Retrieves the path used during the last save of an item.

method.name: GetLastSaveVersion
method.abstract: Retrieves the last save version of an item.

method.name: GetProperty
method.abstract: Reads a property value.

method.name: GetPropertyNames
method.abstract: Retrieves the property name list for the item.

method.name: GetReadOnlyStatus
method.abstract: Reads the access status (Read Only or Read/Write) of the item.

method.name: NeedToBeSaved
method.abstract: Checks if the item needs to be saved.

method.name: SetProperty
method.abstract: Sets a property value.

class.name: CATIxPDMPartItem
class.abstract: Interface to access any V5 Part item that can be stored in an external PDM system.

method.name: GetContextItems
method.abstract: Returns all necessary items for contextual edition of links.

method.name: GetImportedItems
method.abstract: Returns all imported items in this item.

method.name: HasExternalLinks
method.abstract: Check if a Part has external links through imports (geometry or knowledge parameters).

class.name: CATIxPDMProductItem
class.abstract: Interface to access any V5 Product item that can be stored in an external PDM system.

method.name: GetChildrenItems
method.abstract: Returns all children of the item with their pointing instance.

method.name: LoadChildForPropertiesEdition
method.abstract: Load a product child to allow properties edition.

class.name: CATIxPDMSendToService
class.abstract: Interface to manage the Send To functionality.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Adds a file to the list of the files to be copied.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a file from the list of files to be copied.

method.name: Rename
method.abstract: Renames one file to be copied.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Executes the Send To action.

method.name: Simulate
method.abstract: Simulates the Send To operation.

class.name: CATIxPDMSession
class.abstract: Interface to retrieve an item associated with a document in the current editor.

method.name: GetCurrentItem
method.abstract: Retrieves the item associated with the current selected file of the current editor.

method.name: GetRootItem
method.abstract: Retrieves the item associated with the document (root file) of the current editor.
